Files Headings

index.js

 
"use strict"

var next = (global.process && process.nextTick) || global.setImmediate || function (f) {
  setTimeout(f, 0)
}

module.exports = function maybe (cb, promise) {
  if (cb) {
    promise
      .then(function (result) {
        next(function () { cb(null, result) })
      }, function (err) {
        next(function () { cb(err) })
      })
    return undefined
  }
  else {
    return promise
  }
}
